meanings.definition: A painful inflammation of the skin caused by exposure to cold temperatures.
meanings.sent1: After playing in the snow without gloves, my fingers developed chilblains.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended warm socks to prevent chilblains during winter.
meanings.sent3: Even though they looked like tiny red bumps, chilblains made walking uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The chilblains on her cheeks were like angry little fires in the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of chilblains was akin to tiny needles poking at my skin.

meanings.sent1: I fear I may chilblains if I forget my gloves again.
meanings.sent2: She chilblains every winter despite taking precautions.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to chilblains at the worst times.
meanings.sent4: Chilblains seem to enjoy bothering me whenever I least expect it.
meanings.sent5: The way he chilblains makes me grateful for central heating.
